name: Omicron The Game
description:
In "Omicron The Game" you have to protect yourself from virus infection by using only 'arrow keys' at any cost.

I developed this game for the first time in my life. Yes ik its Ctrl C + Ctrl V.

But this is my first step towards game development.

Also thanks to Hooson for creating an amazing tutorial on Game Development for newcomers.

Tutorial I used to make this game (Hooson):

Background Music: That One Bar Scene - RKVC

More interesting things are coming soon
